author: lightclient
content: Per the 1559 wallet call, there was a desire for `eth_gasPrice` to be backwards compatible so initial thought is to add a new optional parameter that signals the caller would like to receive a 1559-style estimate. The alternative is we could add new endpoints `eth_maxPriorityFeePerGas` and `eth_maxFeePerGas` that clients can call to get the new info. cc: <@!322222239850168331>
